Title: Royal Oud Solid Perfume Brass Jar
Description:
Natural Solid Fragrance
Prepared from natural flower oils and beeswax, the fragrance develops and diffuses its voluptuous scent all day long.
Description_All:
Weight
0.034000
Content
4 g.
Story
Luxurious Veda Ayurveda carves out a path to holistic well being of an individual. As per the
principles of this ancient science, the foundation of true health and wellness is built upon harmony
and balance of the body, mind, and soul. Our Luxurious Veda range is both inspired from, and based
on this ancient ayurvedic wisdom. Formulated with these principles in mind, made using natural
ingredients and blends of the purest essential oils, and patiently handcrafted to perfection with
great care – these products and sure to appeal to your senses and elevate your spirit!

Title: Wild Rose Solid Perfume in Brass Cloisonne Jar
Description: Wild Rose / Gulab. This feminine fragrance of rose is floral, powdery and induces the feeling of love and warmth.
Description_All:
Weight
0.034000
Content
4 grams of solid perfume wax in a beautifully hand-painted brass cloisonné / meenakari jar. The wax
will last upto 3-4 months on daily usage of the perfume.
Story
Luxurious Veda Ayurveda carves out a path to holistic well being of an individual. As per the
principles of this ancient science, the foundation of true health and wellness is built upon harmony
and balance of the body, mind, and soul. Our Luxurious Veda range is both inspired from, and based
on this ancient ayurvedic wisdom. Formulated with these principles in mind, made using natural
ingredients and blends of the purest essential oils, and patiently handcrafted to perfection with
great care – these products and sure to appeal to your senses and elevate your spirit!
Ingredients
Base of shea butter, beeswax and vegetable oils infused with natural flower oils. Pure & organic
ingredients that are handmade with love. Non alcoholic, non-toxic and 100% cruelty free.
How to Use
Apply the solid perfume on your pulse points - behind the ears, throat, on the wrists, inside the
elbows, and the back of knees. The fragrance develops and diffuses its voluptuous scent all day
long.
Olfactory Note
It’s a pocket-perfect round jar of pressed ittar perfume that you can carry with you wherever you go
(TSA friendly). The beautiful cloisonné jar is packed in an elegant box that is ideal for gifting
your loved ones.
